Cloze: Common greetings in Italian include {{c1::Ciao}} (informal), {{c2::Buongiorno}} (formal), and farewells like {{c3::Arrivederci}} and {{c4::Buonanotte}}.
Back Extra: Basic formal and informal greetings and farewells used in daily interactions (e.g., Ciao, Buongiorno, Arrivederci, Buonanotte).

Cloze: To introduce yourself, say {{c1::Mi chiamo...}}. To introduce others, use {{c2::Ti presento...}} (informal) or {{c3::Le presento...}} (formal).
Back Extra: Structures for introducing yourself (Mi chiamo...) and others (Ti presento..., Le presento...).

Cloze: To ask for personal info, use {{c1::Come ti chiami?}} (name), {{c2::Di dove sei?}} (nationality), {{c3::Quanti anni hai?}} (age), {{c4::Che lavoro fai?}} (profession), {{c5::Qual è il tuo indirizzo?}} (address), and {{c6::Qual è il tuo numero di telefono?}} (contact).
Back Extra: Questions and answers about name, nationality, age, profession, address, and contact information.

Cloze: Polite requests use {{c1::Potrei avere...?}}, {{c2::Mi può dire...?}}, and {{c3::Vorrei...}}.
Back Extra: Common forms for making polite requests (e.g., Potrei avere..., Mi può dire..., Vorrei...).

Cloze: To ask for directions, use {{c1::Dov'è...?}}. To give directions, say {{c2::Vai dritto}} (go straight), {{c3::Gira a sinistra}} (turn left), or {{c4::Gira a destra}} (turn right).
Back Extra: Phrases to ask for and give directions using imperatives and prepositions (e.g., Dov'è..., Vai dritto, Giri a sinistra).

Cloze: For shopping and ordering, use {{c1::Quanto costa?}} (how much?), {{c2::Vorrei...}} (I would like...), and {{c3::Il conto per favore}} (the bill, please).
Back Extra: Language for interacting in shops, markets, cafés, and restaurants (e.g., Quanto costa?, Vorrei..., Il conto per favore).

Cloze: To make plans, say {{c1::Va bene}} (okay), {{c2::Mi dispiace}} (sorry/refuse), and {{c3::Possiamo...}} (we can...).
Back Extra: Phrases for agreeing, refusing, and suggesting plans (e.g., Va bene, Mi dispiace, Possiamo...).

Cloze: To express likes, use {{c1::Mi piace...}} (I like...). To express dislikes, use {{c2::Non mi piace...}} or {{c3::Non mi piacciono...}}.
Back Extra: Using piacere and other expressions to talk about likes and dislikes (e.g., Mi piace..., Non mi piacciono...).

Cloze: Essential phrases: {{c1::Aiuto!}} (help!), {{c2::Mi sono perso}} (I'm lost), {{c3::Dove si trova il bagno?}} (where is the bathroom?).
Back Extra: Essential phrases for urgent or important situations (e.g., Aiuto!, Mi sono perso, Dove si trova il bagno?).
